title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 81.3 - Personal privacy compliance officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 81.3 - Personal privacy compliance officer

State Regulations
(a) The Director of Public Relations is hereby designated Privacy Compliance

Officer and is responsible for ensuring that the department complies with the
provisions of the Personal Privacy Protection Law and these regulations, and
for coordinating responses to requests for records or amendment of
records. (b) The address and
telephone number of the Privacy Compliance Officer are: New York State

Department of Civil Service, Building 1, W. Averell Harriman State Office

Building Campus, Albany, NY 12239; telephone (518) 457-6221. (c) The Deputy Director of Public Relations
is hereby designated Deputy Privacy Compliance Officer. The address and
telephone number of the deputy are the same as for the privacy compliance
officer set forth in subdivision (b) of this section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
81.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
